Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 178th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2005...
Had first career hit on 5/2/2011, off Sean Henn (TEX)...
Injured on 10/1/2011 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Kansas City to Washington on 2/12/2012 (Going to WSH: 2B D. Gordon, LF D. Muñoz, C J. Jefferies, C S. Valentino, CF F. Pie. Going to KCA: C J. Mauer)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/2012, off Brandon Beachy (FLA)...
Traded from Washington to New York (N) on 2/8/2014 (Going to NYN: C S. Valentino. Going to WSH: SS J. Peterson, P D. Price)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 2/1/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $1,270,000 per year...
